title: BNY CFO: 2026 Market Backdrop is ‘Constructive'
description: Dermot McDonogh, BNY CFO, says uncertainty has become valuable and the firm remains bullish on the economy and markets. He tells Romaine Bostick on “The Close” that the outlook for this year is strong. (Source: Bloomberg)
